fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Employment and Social Affairs, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: We are FEAD recepients and we follow up initiatives from DG EMPL on social cohesion issues.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: EU Platform on Food Losses and Food Waste#E03421#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3421#Member#C#Sub-group to support EU activities to facilitate food donation
goals__remit: We provide food assistance and various accompanying measures in order to facilitate the social inclusion of the most deprived.
relevant_communication:
We have an activity coverage in 2111 centers in France.  
Food aid is the entry door to other social inclusion activities.
